import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import profileReducer from'./profileReducer';import dialogsReducer from'./dialogsReducer';import usersReducer from'./usersReducer';import authReducer from"./authReducer";import thunkMiddleware from'redux-thunk';import{reducer as formReducer}from'redux-form';import appReducer from"./appReducer";var reducers=combineReducers({profilePage:profileReducer,dialogsPage:dialogsReducer,usersPage:usersReducer,auth:authReducer,form:formReducer,app:appReducer});var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(reducers,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware)));//let store = createStore(reducers, applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware));
window.__store__=store;export default store;
